column4: hey, ive just installed Jaunty fresh ( had intrepid) and whenever i run compiz and open firefox my system freezes and restarts...help!
please help me, everytime i open firefox with compiz on py pc literally shuts it self down
no, only rename so it is backed up
delete is the last step ONLY
right, the whole other kernel thing? ive only just installed jaunty. Intrepid worked perfectly
you could also create an additional user to see if it is the users profile which is bad
then why did you fix intrepid if it wasnt broken?
all my setting came from intrepid, so it could be that
i would rename compiz and mozilla settings and rerun both to get new stock settings
i tried to upgrade video drivers, and i screwed the whole system
they may have different layouts which may be causing issues
i will try now. If i log off suddenly, you know you were wrong :p
hp printers have tonnes of support
what about over samba with the hplip driver?
just in general, the hplip driver is awesome
